meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Assumption of Responsibility for Markets (Consolidation) Notification

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Notification may be cited as the Assumption of Responsibility for Markets (Consolidation) Notification.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Assumption of responsibility
section.content: The Organization has assumed responsibility for the regulation and conduct of the wholesale marine fish markets specified in the Schedule.

section.name: s1
section.content: The Aberdeen Wholesale Marine Fish Market at No. 102, Shek Pai Wan Road, Hong Kong.

section.name: s2
section.content: The Shau Kei Wan Wholesale Marine Fish Market at No. 37, Tam Kung Temple Road, Shau Kei Wan, Hong Kong. (L.N. 164 of 1999)

section.name: s3
section.content: Tai Po Wholesale Marine Fish Market at No. 1, Yu On Street, Tai Po, New Territories. (L.N. 104 of 1990)

section.name: s4
section.content: Kwun Tong Wholesale Marine Fish Market at No. 10, Tung Yuen Street, Yau Tong, Kowloon. (L.N. 104 of 1990)

section.name: s5
section.content: The Cheung Sha Wan Wholesale Marine Fish Market at No. 38, Yen Chow Street West, Cheung Sha Wan, Kowloon. (L.N. 164 of 1999)

section.name: s6
section.content: The Castle Peak Wholesale Marine Fish Market at No. 101, Wu Shan Road, Tuen Mun, New Territories. (L.N. 99 of 2011)

section.name: s7
section.content: The Sai Kung Wholesale Marine Fish Market at Hoi Pong Street, D.D. No. 215, Lot No. 691, Sai Kung Town, Sai Kung, New Territories.
